Name: Total Recall
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
22.5 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: A long, burgundy coloured drink with a taste reminiscent of blood orange.
Nutrition: One serving of Total Recall contains 198 calories
